thread.title: Gunmen storm Umhlanga Ocean Basket
thread.title_full: Gunmen storm Umhlanga Ocean Basket | News24

author: news24.com
title: Gunmen storm Umhlanga Ocean Basket
text:
Durban - A gang of armed men stormed an Umhlanga eatery, brandishing weapons and holding patrons at gunpoint on Monday afternoon.
- Were you there? Send us your eyewitness accounts .
The dramatic robbery played out at Ocean Basket on Lagoon Drive as customers enjoyed a late lunch.
Several staff members were assaulted, and were treated at the scene by paramedics.
